classData.comment:
/**
 * Abstract base class for form fields
 * @class Neo.form.field.Base
 * @extends Neo.component.Base
 */
classData.name: Base

classData.comment:
/**
     * @member {Object} delayable
     * @protected
     * @static
     */
classData.name: delayable

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.form.field.Base'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} ntype='basefield'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: ntype

classData.comment:
/**
         * Form groups can get set on any parent component level.
         * An alternative way for using dots in field names.
         * @member {String|null} formGroup_=null
         */
classData.description: Form groups can get set on any parent component level. An alternative way for using dots in field names.
classData.name: formGroup_
name_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Neo itself does not need field names to get mapped to the DOM (input nodes),
         * except for CheckBoxes & Radios to work. It can be useful for testing tools
         * & accessibility though, so the default got set to true.
         * Feel free to change it to false to keep the DOM minimal.
         * @member {Boolean} renderName_=true
         */
classData.description: Neo itself does not need field names to get mapped to the DOM (input nodes), except for CheckBoxes & Radios to work. It can be useful for testing tools & accessibility though, so the default got set to true. Feel free to change it to false to keep the DOM minimal.
classData.name: renderName_

classData.comment:
/**
         * In case renderName is set to true, you can optionally render the combination
         * of all formGroup(s) & the field name into the DOM => input node
         * @member {Boolean} renderPath=true
         */
classData.description: In case renderName is set to true, you can optionally render the combination of all formGroup(s) & the field name into the DOM => input node
classData.name: renderPath
value_

classData.comment:
/**
     * An internal cache for formGroups of all parent levels
     * @member {String|null} formGroupString=null
     */
classData.description: An internal cache for formGroups of all parent levels
classData.name: formGroupString

classData.comment:
/**
     * An internal cache for formGroup(s) and the field name
     * @member {String|null} path=null
     */
classData.description: An internal cache for formGroup(s) and the field name
classData.name: path

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the name config got changed
     * @param {String|null} value
     * @param {String|null} oldValue
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the name config got changed
classData.name: afterSetName

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the value config got changed
     * @param {*} value
     * @param {*} oldValue
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the value config got changed
classData.name: afterSetValue

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered when accessing the formGroup config
     * @param {String|null} value
     * @returns {String|null} parents
     * @protected
     */
classData.name: beforeGetFormGroup

classData.comment:
/**
     * Changes the value of a inputEl vdom object attribute or removes it in case it has no value
     * @param {String} key
     * @param {Array|Number|Object|String|null} value
     * @param {Boolean} silent=false
     */
classData.description: Changes the value of a inputEl vdom object attribute or removes it in case it has no value
classData.name: changeInputElKey

classData.comment:
/**
     * Override this method as needed
     * @param {*}      value
     * @param {*}      oldValue
     * @param {String} eventName
     */
classData.name: doFireChangeEvent

classData.comment:
/**
     * Override this method as needed
     * @param {*} value

classData.comment:
/**
     * Override this method as needed
     * @param {*} value
     * @param {*} oldValue
     */
classData.name: fireUserChangeEvent

classData.description: Forms in neo can be nested. This method will return the closest parent which is a form.Container or null.
classData.name: getClosestForm
getInputEl

classData.description: Returns the combination of the field formGroup(s) & name
classData.name: getPath
getValue
isValid

classData.comment:
/**
     * Resets the field to a new value or null
     * @param {*} value=null
     */
classData.description: Resets the field to a new value or null

classData.comment:
/**
     * Checks for client-side field errors
     * @param {Boolean} silent=true

     */

returns.description: Returns true in case there are no client-side errors
